name: Mimic Me!
description:
Remember don't touch the monsters, you must escape them as soon as possible. This is a speed running game made for GMTK Game Jam 2021: JOINED TOGETHER.

CONTROLS:

"A" to go left

"D" to go right

"SPACE" tp jump

The longer you hold the higher you jump.

CREDITS:

Partial Assets were from Pixel Frog's page and the rest were made by me.

Thank You Very Much
